name: Doug's Auto Repair
description:
You're the worst mechanic in the city. Your reputation precedes you, and you're going out of business  because no one wants to come to your auto shop. So, you bust out the ol' handy jackhammer and drum up business the old fashioned way by making gaping potholes in the road around your shop so people get flat tires and need to pay you a visit. Works every time.

Controls: Movement - WASD / Arrows       Drill Holes - Spacebar
